entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
